@hjortureh @Netlify @contentful Depending on your build, this is pretty rapid. Not quite what you'd want if you need an *instant* preview for content authors. Mine are usually 10-30s from content save to being served on the global, managed CDN. For previews as you work, also perhaps consider @NetlifyCMS
